## What is the [#30DayChartChallenge?](https://30daychartchallenge.org/about/)

As stated on the site, "The #30DayChartChallenge is a community-driven challenge that happens each year during April. Every day, there is a certain prompt, grouped into five categories: comparisons, distributions, relationships, time series, and uncertainties. Anyone is welcome to contribute, no matter which data source or tool is used to create the visualizations." More info on code of conduct from creators [here](https://30daychartchallenge.org/about/).
